summary: This bill, the "Retiring the Egregious Confusion Over the Genuine Name of Israel’s Zone of Influence by Necessitating Government-use of Judea and Samaria Act" (RECOGNIZING Judea and Samaria Act), mandates the U.S. government to refer to the West Bank as Judea and Samaria in official materials. It prohibits the use of the term "West Bank" in government documents, with exceptions for international treaty obligations. The bill also amends several existing laws to replace "West Bank" with "Judea and Samaria."
